name: smartcart
description: Smartcart with backend, frontend, and shared packages

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:mock"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/backend && npm run build --workspace=packages/frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=packages/backend && npm install --workspace=packages/frontend && npm install --workspace=packages/shared
